name: Stay In the Line - Soccer Cup Edition Free!
name_original: Stay In the Line - Soccer Cup Edition Free!
description:
Stay In the Line Soccer Cup Edition!

A fun addicting and simple game for soccer and football fans around the world! Best of all, it's FREE!

HOW TO PLAY

~ Simply swipe your finger left and right to control the path of the soccer ball
~ Stay inside the white line or it's GAME OVER!
